text: Connect City has a long history in the
online retail business basically
supplying data to online retailers and
helping retailers reach their audience I
see my role as keeping everybody in the
company productive Amazon chime calls us
the minute of meeting starts and really
our meetings start to the minute when
they're scheduled in our environment
it's Active Directory integrated so
there is no no requirement for us to set
up a separate login to chime when we set
up a new user we drop them into the
correct group in Active Directory and
users can access chime as they need to
so ease of administration is huge for us
we have very good support from AWS for
the product on the rare occasions that
we have a problem it's very easy for an
end user to o2 send and log files
directly to AWS and then they follow up
with us and we're able to go in open a
ticket and see the problem through a
resolution I'd advise other users to
just make their life simple and choose
chime but offers a full raise full range
of features without an overly
complicated user interface which is
definitely a feature that I liked and
was important to me when selecting that
as our conferencing client in addition
the fact that meetings start on time
huge for us
I don't know of any other client that
does that and that's that's a big one
for us add in the active host pricing
and to me that was an obvious choice
